home.field: 医学 / 计算机 / 数学 / 物理

greeting.title: 你好，我是白喵喵！
greeting.subtitle: 简介
greeting.profile:
你好！我是白喵喵，四川大学基础医学院与法医学院/生物治疗国家重点实验室的二年级硕士研究生，导师是黄灿华教授。我的专业涉及所有领域。

我的目标是推动人类在医学、计算机科学、数学和物理学方面的知识和能力的边界。我渴望开发创新和智能的解决方案，整合这些领域的原理，以应对复杂的现实挑战。具体来说，我对探索有效高效地利用多模态数据、先进的计算模型和数学框架，以增强科学和医疗领域的理解、决策和问题解决能力感兴趣。我也热衷于发现新的跨学科方法，以推动有意义的进展。

最新动态：我目前正在进行交叉领域（数学/物理/医学/计算机）的研究，积极寻求交流与合作!

quote.words: 阻碍学习的绝对不是知识本身的难度，而是学习梯度的不合理设计和缺乏先备知识
quote.author: <cite>白喵喵</cite>

edu.course: 医学影像与放射诊断、超声诊断、介入放射学、核医学、内科学、外科学、妇产科学、儿科学、生理学、生物化学与分子生物学、病理学、免疫学与细胞生物学。
edu.additionalCourse: 数学分析，线性代数，概率论与数理统计

edu.course: 疾病发病机制、医学分子生物学、医药生物技术前沿、蛋白质和酶的分离纯化技术、核酸分子克隆技术、实用组织学技术
edu.additionalCourse: 机器学习与深度学习，算法

timeline.content: Hello! I'm Baimiaomiao, a researcher and educator at Sichuan University. My expertise lies in medicine, bioinformatics, mathematics, and physics, with a focus on leveraging computational techniques to solve biomedical challenges. Passionate about interdisciplinary research, I aim to bridge the gap between technology and healthcare to drive innovation. Welcome to my website, where I share my work, ideas, and ongoing projects. Let's connect and explore new possibilities together!Hello! I'm Baimiaomiao, a researcher and educator at Sichuan University.

featuredPublications.title: Dysfunction of GluN3A subunit is involved in depression-like behaviors through synaptic deficits
featuredPublications.abstract: GluN3A, an inhibitory subunit of N-methyl-d-aspartate receptors (NMDARs), plays an unclear role in depression. In this study, we examined GluN3A expression in a chronic restraint stress (CRS) mouse model of depression and explored its molecular mechanisms. We found that GluN3A expression was significantly reduced in the hippocampus of CRS mice, and restoring GluN3A expression alleviated depression-like behaviors. Furthermore, GluN3A knockout (KO) mice exhibited symptoms of anhedonia and despair, alongside downregulation of genes involved in synapse and axon development. Reduced PSD95 levels in GluN3A KO mice were rescued by viral re-expression of GluN3A, highlighting its crucial role in regulating synaptic function and depression-related behaviors. Despite these findings, the full mechanism by which GluN3A contributes to depression remains unclear.

location.name: 四川大学 华西基础医学院与法医学院/生物治疗国家重点实验室

list.编程语言: C, Java, Linux, Python, R, MATLAB, Javascript, MySQL

生物信息学: RNA-seq质控与数据清洗: Trimming, Filtering, Alignment (STAR, HISAT2)
基因突变寻找与注释: SNPs, Indels, CNVs
RNA-seq下游分析: Differential gene expression analysis, Alternative splicing analysis, GO/KEGG/GSEA enrichment analysis
单细胞测序: Seurat V5, Monocle, Scanpy, Celltree
多组学可视化: Heatmaps, Volcano plots, PCA, t-SNE, UMAP, Circos plots
多组学联合分析: WGS, WES, GWAS, RNA-Seq, ChIP-Seq, ATAC-seq, Metabolomics, Proteomics
生物信息学机器学习: Predictive models, Clustering algorithms (K-means, Hierarchical)
高级框架/开发技能.前端开发: 全栈开发: React, Bootstrap, Flask, Node.js

list.临床相关技能: 病史采集, 体格检查, 生命监测, 急诊技能等
list.分子生物学技能: qPCR, Western Blot, ELISA, RNA干扰, 原位杂交技术等
list.细胞生物学技能: 细胞培养与转染, 类器官培养, 免疫荧光, 流式细胞术
list.动物模型构建: 小鼠相关肿瘤模型构建, 药理学研究
list.科技论文写作: 研究、综述类文章写作，研究计划书写

awardsAndHonors.name: 校三等奖学金/科技先进个人
awardsAndHonors.desc: 因在"2020年大学创新实验项目"中领导NMDA受体NR3A敲除小鼠的研究以及在"生命科学学院天际项目"中对NR3A在抑郁症分子机制中的作用的贡献而获奖，同时还因在"重庆医科大学第八届概念杯"中关于m6A甲基化在自闭症机制中作用的研究提案设计获优秀奖
